subject: [R] Different fonts on different axes
body:
Hi Folks,
How do I get red bold font on my y axis and black standard font on my  
x axis?

plot(runif(10), ylab="Red, Bold?", xlab="Black, standard?")

Any pointers or examples would be great.
Thanks!
